title: #334:  Vermonster Mash
description:
It must be Halloween season because things are getting SPOOKY on Bravo. First we have an episode of Real Housewives of Orange County that's all about candles and deception. And peas — both frozen and brain size. Then we head to Vermont where the women of Real Housewives of New Jersey are busy screaming at each other on the slopes of Stowe Mountain. Fun times!

00:00:00 - Intro & Superfight
00:12:35 - RHOC
01:17:32 - RHONJ

author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
